channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waiting for Codman: 100+ Years of Profits > Patients
item.description: By LEONARD D’AVOLIO I’m in the waiting room of the New England Baptist Hospital. They just wheeled my father to the OR. It’s strange to be back. Once ...

item.title: The shutdown leaves telehealth for Medicare patients in limbo
item.description: Telehealth for Medicare started during the pandemic and became popular quickly. But the shutdown put an abrupt halt to payments for the service.

item.title: White House strikes deals for lower prices on obesity drugs
item.description: Medicare beneficiaries will soon be able to get obesity and Type 2 diabetes drugs for a $50 copay. But there are some limitations.

item.title: Farmers, Barbers, and GOP Lawmakers Grapple With the Fate of ACA Tax Credits

item.title: Bird flu surges among poultry amid a scaled back federal response
item.description: Migrating wild birds are spreading the virus to domesticated flocks, increasing the risk of eventually seeing a human outbreak. Scientists are trouble...

item.title: AI steps in to detect the world's deadliest infectious disease
item.description: There's a global shortage of radiologists. Now artificial intelligence is helping speed up the diagnosis of tuberculosis in hard-to-reach communities.

item.title: White House Calls This 9/11-Era Fund ‘Wasteful.’ Red and Blue States Rely on It.
item.description: States from California to Texas say they rely on tens of millions in federal funding to help them prepare for the next pandemic, cyberattack, or mass-...

item.title: What the Health? From KFF Health News: The State of the Affordable Care Act

item.title: Is Covid During Pregnancy Linked to Autism? What a New Study Shows, and What It Doesn’t
item.description: Massachusetts researchers examine how growth and learning are subtly shaped among children whose mothers had covid while pregnant.

item.title: The ‘After Phase’ Is Missing: Why Every GLP-1 Prescription Needs an Exit
